title: Space the new frontier in renewable energy?
lead: Scots energy group and ESA team up to use satellites to improve windfarm efficiency

title: Could the ‘first’ hydrogen firing of industrial boiler in Manchester hold the key to UK’s decarbonisation?
lead: The ‘HyNet Industrial Fuel Switching’ programme aims to make the industry confident to make the switch from natural gas to hydrogen

title: New national circular economy research hub to be based at University of Exeter
lead: It forms part of a £30m programme to move the UK towards a circular economy, in which waste products and materials are reused, repaired or recycled to extend their lifecycle

title: Vattenfall launches ‘fossil-free’ hydrogen study that could slash Sweden’s total emissions by 20%
lead: The energy company will work with the Swedish fuel company Preem to produce ‘fossil-free’ hydrogen for biofuel production

title: Gas networks unveil blueprint to deliver ‘Britain’s first’ hydrogen town by 2030
lead: The companies are planning to invest £28 billion in hydrogen projects across the country by 2032

title: World celebrates US return to Paris Accord under President Biden
lead: The UN Chief António Guterres, the Prime Minister Boris Johnson and the COP26 President were among the first to hail Biden’s move

title: Air quality restrictions eased for Los Angeles crematoriums due to Covid
lead: California’s air pollution control agency said the Covid-19 pandemic has led to a backlog in bodies waiting to be cremated

title: Energy Minister expects ‘significant progress’ on the Energy White Paper over the next two years
lead: Anne-Marie Trevelyan said she will soon publish plans how the government will decarbonise heat, buildings and industries

title: Sadiq Khan’s pandemic bike lanes ruled unlawful
lead: A Mayor of London spokesperson said they are seeking to appeal the judgement

title: New £3.7m sustainable aviation test centre planned for Orkney
lead: Different types of low carbon aircraft, including electric, hydrogen and sustainable aviation fuels, will be tested
